feature1.explanation: Both texts utilize hyphens and commas to separate clauses and phrases.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical choices, sentence structure, discourse features, and error-free text, there is a moderate confidence level that the two texts were written by the same author.
